QuestData.Title: The Bloodshed Never Ends
QuestData.Description: You are insatiable, gladiator! Let none doubt your voracious appetite for destruction and death!$B$BImperator Mar'gok will be very pleased to see you battling upon the arena floor of the Coliseum once more!$B$BAs before, I will accept nothing less than 100 lives!$B$BKill or be killed, gladiator!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 100 Gladiators at the Coliseum in Highmaul.$B$BYou may access the Coliseum by talking to Kharg at Highmaul or Boneslag at your Gladiator's Sanctum.
